Name: Least expensive
Development method: Optimizing for damage for all DR and total costs using default scenario
Rationale: From the 200 policies resulting from our optimization, 11 had an area of dike increase of 60% or less. This one was the cheapest.

Name: Null damage
Development method: Optimizing for damage for all DR and total costs using default scenario
Rationale: From the 200 policies resulting from our optimization, 11 had an area of dike increase of only 60%. This one generated null damage in all DR showing the limitations of an MOO. We want to further explore uncertainties for this one.

Name: Compromise
Development method: Optimizing for damage for all DR and total costs using default scenario
Rationale: From the 200 policies resulting from our optimization, 11 had an area of dike increase of only 60%. This one had a median cost and good results

Name: Most expensive
Development method: Optimizing for damage for all DR and total costs using default scenario
Rationale: From the 200 policies resulting from our optimization, 11 had an area of dike increase of only 60%. This one was the most expensive.
